kmq.title: Wrong Song Name?
kmq.message: Have a suggestion for an alternate song name? Tell us on the support server!

kmq.title: Song has an incorrect date?
kmq.message: Is a song from the early 2000s showing up in your 2017-2020 game? Tell us on the support server!

kmq.title: Beep Boop
kmq.message: Did you know KMQ is open source? [Check us out on Github and give us a star!](https://github.com/Brainicism/KMQ_Discord/)

kmq.title: Like KMQ?
kmq.message: Give us a vote and leave a review on [Top.GG!](https://top.gg/bot/508759831755096074)

game.title: Did you know?
game.message: Raise the stakes and try `elimination` mode where you lose a life for not guessing correctly â˜ . See `,help play` for more details.

game.title: Did you know?
game.message: You can set which years you want to hear songs from using the `cutoff` game option. See `,help cutoff` for more details.

game.title: Did you know?
game.message: You can set which groups you *don't* want to hear songs from using the `exclude` game option. See `,help exclude` for more details.

game.title: Did you know?
game.message: You can set what gender groups you want to hear songs from using the `gender` game option. See `,help gender` for more details.

game.title: Did you know?
game.message: You can set which groups you want to exclusively hear songs from using the `groups` game option. See `,help groups` for more details.

game.title: Did you know?
game.message: You can limit the number of songs you hear from by popularity. See `,help limit` for more details.

game.title: Did you know?
game.message: Tired of guessing song names? Switch it up by changing the guess mode to `artist` or `both`. See `,help mode` for more details.

game.title: Did you know?
game.message: You can reset the game options by using `,reset`.

game.title: Did you know?
game.message: You can pick whether each song starts from the `beginning` or `random` position. See `,help seek` for more details.

game.title: Did you know?
game.message: You can avoid songs repeating too frequently by changing the `shuffle` game option. See `,help shuffle` for more details.

game.title: Did you know?
game.message: You can set a time limit for guessing each song by using the `timer` game option. See `,help timer` for more details.

game.title: Did you know?
game.message: You can see how many games you've played and how many songs you've guessed in total using `,profile`.

game.title: Did you know?
game.message: Think you got what it takes to be a top KMQ player? See `,leaderboard` and `,help leaderboard` to see where you stand.

game.title: Did you know?
game.message: You can pick whether you want to hear from soloists or groups using `,artisttype`? See `,help artisttype` to learn more.

game.title: Did you know?
game.message: Don't like hearing japanese/english/chinese songs? Check out `,language`? See `,help language` to learn more.
